name: eat-da-burger-app
description: This app is all about eating burgers, yes, that's right! You'll create a burger logger with MySQL, Node, Express, Handlebars and a homemade ORM (yum!). Be sure to follow the MVC design pattern; use Node and MySQL to query and route data in your app, and Handlebars to generate your HTML. * Eat-Da-Burger! is a restaurant app that lets users input the names of burgers they'd like to eat. ```
